content: this crochet mushroom applique is the next creation in my series of heart-shaped appliques the cap of this mushroom is made from a heart i made my mushrooms in two sizes and they are perfect for embellishing kids clothes blankets hats etc finished size the larger mushroom applique is about 3 - 1/4 8-1/2 cm tall and the smaller mushroom applique is about 2 - 1/5 6-1/2 cm tall free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-mushroom-applique/ video tutorial https //youtu be/kp99qe1jdhc si=ukkhzrfw3y79hpv4
